property.name: nifi.node.protocol.port
property.description: Port NiFi node protocol runs on

property.name: nifi.initial_mem
property.description: Initial memory allocation for NiFi JVM (Xms)

property.name: nifi.max_mem
property.description: Max memory allocation for Nifi JVM (Xmx)

property.name: nifi.ambari_reporting_frequency
property.description: Frequency with which Nifi metrics will be reported to Ambari Metrics. Only used during initial install of service. Post-install this can be reconfigured from Nifi UI under Controller Settings

property.name: nifi.flow.config.dir
property.description: The directory to store the flow.xml.gz file. This directory must be writable by the nifi user

property.name: nifi.database.dir
property.description: The directory for the database repository. This directory must be writable by the nifi user

property.name: nifi.flowfile.repository.dir
property.description: The directory for the flowfile repository. This directory must be writable by the nifi user

property.name: nifi.content.repository.dir.default
property.description: The default directory for the content repository. This directory must be writable by the nifi user

property.name: nifi.provenance.repository.dir.default
property.description: The default directory for the provenance repository. This directory must be writable by the nifi user
